item.title: Flytipping and vermin, 8th September
item.description:
There is an overflowing skip into which people are fly-tipping materials, which is falling out onto the property and beginning to spill out onto the pavement. I have seen some rats in and around the skip but not been able to take a photo of them.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blandford Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amount of flytipped household rubbish and furniture parts, 8th September
item.description:
This has been a problem for months and has not been cleared despite being reported by other users. It seems to encourage others to do the same, and is treated like a wasteland that people bin things. Can it please be cleared?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stuart Road, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dogs fouling and litter, 8th September
item.description:
Hello, Could you inform me if you are putting dog fouling and litter notices up on the small Borough green at the beginning of Gravelwood close? I tried to call to find out but the phone keeps cutting off and options to pick a dept does not work. I spoke to Benjamin but didn’t get an answer due to the phone problems. Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Gravelwood Close, London
Report on FixMyStreet
